pages.title: Using Loudspeakers
pages.text: Loudspeakers are means of playing sounds broadcasted over radio. You can place many in one location to fill the area with sound. To operate a loudspeaker, place it down. Interact with the display on top to change the channel. You can cover the top face if you don't want others changing the channel.
